headline: MS382.001E: Interview with Betty Cunningham and Linda Williams (transcript)
sentences: Digital copies of resources which are made available by BCSC include materials for which any of the following circumstances may apply: 1) the rights to the resource are held by BCSC; 2) the copyright holder has given BCSC permission to make the resource available for personal or research use; 3) the resource is available under an exception or limitation to US copyright law, such as 17 USC 107 and 17 USC 108(h); or 4) there are no known restrictions on use.

Betty Cunningham and her daughter Linda Williams were interviewed by Friends of the North Carolina Room volunteers Tealey Ellis and Judith Robertson on June 13, 2018 at the interviewees' home on Merrill Road in Fairview.
